# cloudSharingController(_:failedToSaveShareWithError:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller failed to save the share record.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func cloudSharingController(_ csc: UICloudSharingController, failedToSaveShareWithError error: any Error)
```

## Discussion

Implement this method to receive a notification from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance after it fails to save changes to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] record.

## Processing shared items

- **cloudSharingControllerDidStopSharing(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has stopped sharing the record.
- **cloudSharingControllerDidSaveShare(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller saved the share record.
